#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int s[101],end[101],temp[101];
bool comp(int a, int b)
{
	return end[a] < end[b];
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			cin >> s[i] >> end[i];
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			temp[i] = i;
		sort(temp+1, temp+n+1, comp);
		sort(end+1, end+n+1);
		int j = 1,c=1;
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		{
			if(end[j] < s[temp[i]])
			{
				c++;
				j = i;
			}
		}
		cout << c << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
